page.title: 02FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS
page.content:
There are branches of three major banks in Holmes Chapel. All are very busy, despite many customers having their accounts at branches elsewhere. This is due to so many people moving into the area to live and keeping their accounts at branches either near their place of work or near to their previous home. Nevertheless, all normal facilities are available, although there is sometimes delay when a larger office has to be contacted.
There are agencies of major building societies based in the offices of the three estate agents. These societies enable people to save money, borrow money for the purchase of homes or repay outstanding mortgages. The estate agents sell property on behalf of house owners and are extremely busy due to the mobility of the population.
